mapper.insert: insert into tm_video_desc (VIDEO_ID, CHN_NAME, ENG_NAME, TRAIN_MUSCLE, START_ACTION, ESSEN_EXERCISE, REMIND, CREATE_BY, CREATE_ON, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_ON) values (#{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainMuscle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{essenExercise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tm_video_desc set CHN_NAME = #{chnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENG_NAME = #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAIN_MUSCLE = #{trainMuscle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ACTION = #{startAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESSEN_EXERCISE = #{essenExercise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMIND = #{remind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_ON = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_ON = #{updateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select VIDEO_ID, CHN_NAME, ENG_NAME, TRAIN_MUSCLE, START_ACTION, ESSEN_EXERCISE, REMIND, CREATE_BY, CREATE_ON, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_ON from tm_video_desc where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
